discussion_comments.comment_body:
Hey there 👋 

Luckily for you, `@storybook/nextjs` handles postcss configuration of storybook for you 🎉 

That means you can drop the addon options

```suggestion
    "@storybook/addon-styling",
```

Same for the `resolveProjectDir`:

```ts
export function resolveProjectDir(appDir: boolean, srcDir: boolean) {
  if (appDir && srcDir) return "src/app"
  if (appDir) return "app"
  if (srcDir) return "src"

  return ""
}
```
